title: Verdant Bangalore Urban Oasis with Botanic Gardens & Outdoor Pool
description: Be transported to another world at this five-star oasis in the heart of Bangalore, decorated by verdant gardens of frangipanis and bougainvillea. With a centenarian raintree at its centre, enjoy the tranquillity of this botanic retreat after a day spent exploring the vibrant cultural scene of India's tech capital. Savour the finest international fare at Lapis, dine alfresco with Thai plates at Rim Naam, or delight in handcrafted cocktails at The Polo Club.

title: Comfortable Yeshwantpur Stay in Bengaluru's Peenya Area
description: Rest and recharge with a comfortable stay at Holiday Inn Express Bengaluru Yeshwantpur, an IHG hotel. This hassle-free stay is conveniently located within the manufacturing hub of Bengaluru and close to the local railway station, making it the perfect place to reset during your travels. Start your day with an Express Start Breakfast at the hotel’s restaurant and take time to soak up the sun in the stylish courtyard.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Bengaluru Yeshwantpur, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Ward No 38, Cauvery Estates (Serenity), Katha 10/1/1, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560022, India

title: Five-Star Bengaluru The Leela City Break with Five Restaurants
description: The Leela Bhartiya City Bengaluru is nestled amidst the pristine environs of Bhartiya City - Bengaluru’s largest integrated township, spread across 135 acres of Special Economic Zone. The Leela Bhartiya City Bengaluru is a luxurious enclave of timeless elegance, opulent interiors and its traditional values of glorious Indian legacy. The hotel features an impressive lobby, 281 luxurious guestrooms and suites, extensive banqueting and conferencing venues, a world class spa and state-of-the-art fitness studio and a collection of five restaurants, offering indulgent gastronomic delights accompanied with its stunning views. Merely a half an hour drive from the Kempegowda International Airport Bengaluru (BLR), The Leela Bhartiya City Bengaluru undeniably promises to be the preferred destination in North Bengaluru.
offer_address: 6/2, Thanisandra Main Rd, Devin Paradise Enclave, Tirumanahalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560064, India

vendor_name: Grand Mercure Bengaluru at Gopalan Mall
title: India: Bengaluru Urban Escape with Onsite Restaurant, Terrace Bar, Spa & Outdoor Pool
description:
Step into Bengaluru's most dynamic district with a stay at Grand Mercure Gopalan Mall, a sleek urban sanctuary in India's buzzing tech capital. Watch culinary magic unfold at La Utsav's interactive kitchens serving global cuisine, then your only other decision is whether to do lengths in the pool or sink into a state of bliss at the spa.

When the sun sets, head to 1026 AD outdoor bar for cocktails or mocktails under moonlit skies. Located in Gopalan Mall nearby the serene Ulsoor Lake, you're in the best spot to explore Bangalore's diversity. Discover the majestic Bangalore Palace, sprawling Lalbagh Botanical Garden and verdant Cubbon Park.
location_description: Grand Mercure Bengaluru at Gopalan Mall
offer_address: Opposite RMZ Infinity Techpark, Swamy Vivekananda Road, Bengaluru 560093, India

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Bengaluru Whitefield Itpl
title: Stylish Bangalore Metropolitan Stay with Gym & Cafe
description: Whether you’re travelling to the IT capital of India for work or leisure, a stay at Holiday Inn Express Bengaluru Whitefield ITPL, an IHG Hotel offers the ideal atmosphere for relaxing. Grab a quick and nourishing breakfast at the hotel’s Express Café and head to explore the exciting area of Whitefield, or get productive thanks to the hotel’s business services. Wind down after a day of work or travel in the hotel’s own fitness centre, boasting elliptical machines, weights and treadmills.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Bengaluru Whitefield ITPL, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Plot No. 4, EPIP Zone, Bengaluru, 560066 India

title: Five-Star Old-World Bengaluru Palace Stay with Lush Waterfall Gardens
description: Embrace the royal treatment with an escape to the five-star copper-domed opulence of The Leela Palace Bengaluru. Inspired by the grand architecture of the Royal Palace of Mysore, the palace offers guests a taste of true historical luxury - wander across seven stately acres of palm-lined paths, rushing cascades and white marble fountains or explore the hotel’s immense collection of Hindu sculptures, antiques and painted masterpieces. Dine across four excellent restaurants, experience holistic treatments at The Spa or enjoy a glass of your preferred libation under The Library Bar’s magnificent Victorian-era chandeliers. Only a 30-minute drive from the city’s spectacular public parks and brilliant music scene, The Leela Palace Bengaluru's unrivalled magnificence and flawless hospitality stand a world apart.
